components module¶

Module containing functions to setup components of the game.

components.create_battleships(filename='battleships.txt')¶

Reads the file ‘filename’ and returns a dictionary containing keys as battleship name and value as its size.

components.initialise_board(size=10)¶

Returns a list of ‘size’ elements, with each element being a list containing ‘size’ elements.

components.place_battleships(board, ships, algorithm='Simple')¶

Places the battleships on the board using the specified algorithm and returns the board.

Battleships
